segments.text: I'm playing with my new jump rope ! Watch this !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are sick , young lady . Get back in bed ! I called you in sick today , so you're going to lie down and fight that flu !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then maybe you should go to school . If you're feeling so much better , you'll ace that English test , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I get it . I'm getting back into bed ...
segments.speaker: S1
